ygData.subject: Re: Attention: Bards of E'ci
ygData.msgSnippet: Not a bad idea at all.  Get as many bards together in one group, imagine the lightshow!  We ll probably not even be able to see where we re going! Roop E ci
ygData.messageBody:
Not a bad idea at all. Get as many bards together in one group, imagine the
lightshow! We'll probably not even be able to see where we're going!

Roop
E'ci


>From: Jessica Hankins <polyhymnia@...>
>
>I've heard a few names of fellow musicians on our district mentioned here.
I'd
>be thrilled to see us meet in game soon. If you're available to join
Shulzari
>for a few drinks and song (and maybe a hunt!) in Freeport sometime this
week,
>or weekend, it would be an honor to purchase brew for you all, and share a
tune
>or two!
>
>--Shulzari
>Poswardd of E'ci
>http://www.soerbaird.com
